attributes.action: ensure that MP's are not to be excluded from The Freedom of Information act.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That taxpayers should be able to request and see the detailed expenses of all MP's and that there should be no amendment excluding MP's from certain parts of the Freedom of Information Act.  It's taxpayers money they are spending and therefore they have to be fully accountable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
